element.name: tspacer
element.short: TSpacer connects widgets by the link* properties

descr.p: . Its position is defined by the size and position of the leading linked widgets, normally the linkleft/linktop widget if options spao_glueright/spao_gluebottom are not set.
TExpandingWidget, tspacer, tsplitter and tlayouter adjust their size according to the settings of optionsscale and the size and position of embedded widgets.

element.name: tsplitter
element.short: TSplitter connects widgets by the link* properties

descr.p: . There size/position is defined by the position of tsplitter.
TExpandingWidget, tspacer, tsplitter and tlayouter adjust their size according to the settings of optionsscale and the size and position of embedded widgets.
